document.heading: Foster Care Youth Employment Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-162, the “Foster Care Youth Employment Amendment Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-691, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 17, 2012, and May 1, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 16, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-372 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-162 became effective on July 13, 2012.
